00018 #include "cmodulechooserbar.h"
00019 #include "cmodulechooserbutton.h"
00020 
00021 #include <qtimer.h>
00022 
00023 CModuleChooserBar::CModuleChooserBar(ListCSwordModuleInfo useModules, CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType type, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00024     : KToolBar(parent,name) {
00025 //  qDebug("constructor of CModuleCHooserBar");
00026 
00027     m_moduleType = type;
00028     m_idCounter = 0;
00029     m_buttonLimit = -1; //-1 means no limit
00030 
00031   //insert buttons if useModules != 0
00032     for (useModules.first(); useModules.current(); useModules.next())        {
00033         if (m_buttonLimit && (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit <= m_buttonList.count())
00034             break;
00035             
00036         CModuleChooserButton* b = new CModuleChooserButton(useModules.current(),m_moduleType,++m_idCounter,this);
00037         m_buttonList.append(b);
00038         insertWidget(m_idCounter, b->size().width(),b);
00039         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigAddButton()), this, SLOT(addButton()) );
00040         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigRemoveButton(const int)), this, SLOT(removeButton(const int)) );
00041         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), SIGNAL(sigChanged()) );
00042         b->show();
00043     }
00044   if (m_buttonLimit && (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit > m_buttonList.count() )
00045       addButton();
00046 }
00047 
00049 void CModuleChooserBar::addButton(){
00050     CModuleChooserButton* b = new CModuleChooserButton(0, m_moduleType, ++m_idCounter, this);
00051     m_buttonList.append(b); 
00052     insertWidget(m_idCounter, b->size().width(),b);         
00053     
00054     connect( b, SIGNAL(sigAddButton()), this, SLOT(addButton()) );
00055     connect( b, SIGNAL(sigRemoveButton(const int)), this, SLOT(removeButton(const int)) );
00056     connect( b, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), SIGNAL(sigChanged()) );
00057     
00058     b->show();
00059 }
00060 
00062 void CModuleChooserBar::removeButton( const int ID ){
00063     for (m_buttonList.first(); m_buttonList.current(); m_buttonList.next()) {   
00064         if (m_buttonList.current()->getId() == ID) {    //found the right button
00065             CModuleChooserButton* b = m_buttonList.current();
00066             m_buttonList.removeRef(b);
00067             b->hide();
00068       b->deleteLater();
00069             break;
00070         }
00071     }       
00072     
00073     emit sigChanged();
00074 }
00075 
00077 ListCSwordModuleInfo CModuleChooserBar::getModuleList(){
00078     ListCSwordModuleInfo list;
00079     list.setAutoDelete(false);
00080     list.clear();
00081     
00082     for (m_buttonList.first(); m_buttonList.current(); m_buttonList.next()) {   
00083       CSwordModuleInfo* m = m_buttonList.current()->module();
00084       if (m)
00085         list.append( m );
00086     }
00087     return list;
00088 }
00089 
00091 void CModuleChooserBar::setButtonLimit(const int limit){
00092     m_buttonLimit = limit;
00093     if (m_buttonList.count() > (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit ) {  //remove the last buttons
00094         for (m_buttonList.last(); m_buttonList.current() && (m_buttonList.count() > (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit); m_buttonList.prev() ) {
00095             CModuleChooserButton* b = m_buttonList.current();
00096             m_buttonList.remove(b);
00097             b->hide();
00098             delete b;
00099         }
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00104 void CModuleChooserBar::setModules( ListCSwordModuleInfo useModules ){
00105     setButtonLimit(0);  
00106     setButtonLimit(-1);     //these two lines clear the bar
00107     
00108     for (useModules.first(); useModules.current(); useModules.next())        {
00109         if (m_buttonLimit && (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit <= m_buttonList.count())
00110             break;
00111             
00112         CModuleChooserButton* b = new CModuleChooserButton(useModules.current(),m_moduleType,++m_idCounter,this);
00113         m_buttonList.append(b);
00114         insertWidget(m_idCounter, b->size().width(),b);
00115         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigAddButton()), this, SLOT(addButton()) );
00116         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigRemoveButton(const int)), this, SLOT(removeButton(const int)) );
00117         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), SIGNAL(sigChanged()) );
00118         b->show();
00119     }
00120   if (m_buttonLimit && (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit > m_buttonList.count() )
00121       addButton();
00122 }
